original_text: If, however, the woman has not made herself impure, but is clean, she will be cleared of guilt and will be able to have children.
korean_text: 그러나 여인이 더럽힌 일이 없고 정결하면 해를 받지 않고 임신하리라

sentences.original_text: If, however, the woman has not made herself impure
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 여자가 자신을 부정하게 만들지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: she will be cleared of guilt
and will be able to have children
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자녀를 가질 수 있게 될 것입니다
